statements: DELETE FROM genetic_sequencing_data WHERE experiment_name = 'Experiment1' AND study_name = 'StudyA';
DELETE FROM genetic_sequencing_data WHERE experiment_name LIKE 'Ex%' AND study_name = 'StudyB';
DELETE FROM sample_data WHERE experiment_id = 2 AND sample_name = 'Sample ABC';
DELETE FROM SequencingData WHERE sample_id IN (SELECT sample_id FROM Sample WHERE experiment_id IN (SELECT experiment_id FROM Experiment WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'))
DELETE FROM Sample WHERE collection_date < '2022-01-01' AND experiment_id IN (SELECT experiment_id FROM Experiment WHERE experiment_name LIKE '%example%')
DELETE FROM sample WHERE sample_id IN (SELECT sample_id FROM experiment WHERE experiment_name = 'Example Experiment');
DELETE FROM sequencing_data WHERE sample_id = (SELECT sample_id FROM sample WHERE sample_name = 'Example Sample');
